course_title: Global Topics in NBB: Neuroscientist's Sensory Exp.
class_notes:
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 16 - June 22, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
Topic:  Neuroscientist's Sensory Experience of Paris
